game_description: ImmersiveLink Careers: is a virtual learning platform used to deliver fully immersive experiences in careers across Canada direct to students and job seekers. ImmersiveLink Careers provides a multi-sensory experience to enhance the understanding of jobs and worksites; to create motivation, spark confidence and determine suitability/fit through an individualâ€™s own lens. ImmersiveLink Cultural: is a virtual learning platform used to deliver fully immersive Indigenous cultural experiences. Featuring Indigenous knowledge keepers, ImmersiveLink Cultural provides Indigenous and non-Indigenous learners the ability to experience and increase their awareness of significant cultural protocols and activities, understand the love Indigenous people have for the land, and help communicate Indigenous world views from Nations across Canada.
review_1: Just a standard 360 video that does not make you feel like you are there and both eyes get the exact same image so like most 360 videos they are awkward to watch and make you feel sick, this is supposed to be the age where virtual reality is next gen, to me next gen is high resolution 3d separate image per eye to get the full 3d effect,, this was not that and these sort of videos is what put people off getting VR.
